name: app/app.js
content:
import "./codeCharta/codeCharta.js";

angular.module("app", ["app.codeCharta"]);

name: app/codeCharta/codeCharta.js
app/codeCharta/codeCharta.spec.js
app/codeCharta/codeChartaController.js
CodeChartaController
description: This is the main controller of the CodeCharta application

name: loadFileOrSample
description: Tries to load the file specified in the given url. Loads sample data if it fails.

name: loadingFinished
description: called after map loading finished. Applies the default scenario.

name: initHandlers
description: initializes keypress handlers

name: printErrors
description: Prints errors to the browser console and alerts the user

name: app/codeCharta/codeChartaController.spec.js
app/codeCharta/codeChartaDirective.js
CodeChartaDirective
description: This directive is the entry point of the CodeCharta application

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/codeMap.js
app/codeCharta/codeMap/codeMapAssetService.js
CodeMapAssetService
description:
This service inits all materials and geo's defined in @link{codeMap.js}.
This way we have control over material/geo creation and caching.

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/codeMapController.js
CodeMapController
description: Controls the codeMapDirective

name: hovered
description: hovered mesh

name: selected
description: selected mesh

name: mouse
description: current mouse position

name: update
description: Update method which is bound to the {@link UpdateCycleService}

name: lock
description: a lock to prevent event spamming

name: onDocumentMouseMove
description: updates {CodeMapController.mouse} on mouse movement

name: onDocumentMouseDown
description: updates {CodeMapController} on mouse down

name: onBuildingHovered
description: Called when a building is hovered.

name: unhoverGroup
description: Unhovers a group

name: meshIsInMeshesWithoutCurrent
description: Checks if the given mesh is in meshes array. Ignores itself in meshes array

return.description: true if found, false if not

name: hoverGroup
description: Hovers a group.

name: unselectGroup
description: unselects a group

name: selectGroup
description: selects a group

name: onBuildingSelected
description: called when a building is selected.

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/codeMapDirective.js
CodeMapDirective
description: Renders the codeMap canvas.

name: link
description: Inits the three canvas and starts animating

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/codeMapService.js
CodeMapService
description: Main service to manage the state of the rendered code map

name: root
description: the root of the scene graph

name: scaleTo
description: scales the scene by the given values

name: applySettings
description: Applies the given settings and redraws the scene

name: drawFromData
description: Draws the map from the given (dataService) data.

params.name: amountOfTopLabels
params.description: number of highest buildings with labels

name: drawMap
description: Draws the map

params.name: amountOfTopLabels
params.description: number of highest buildings with labels

name: addGrid
description: Adds a grid to the scene

name: colorMap
description: Colors the cubes depending on their node data and the given values.

name: colorBase
description: Colors the 'folders'

name: colorDelta
description: colors the delta block of o

name: centerMap
description: centers the map at point (w,l)

name: addNode
description: adds a node to the scene

params.name: showLabel
params.description: true if the building should get a label

name: addRoot
description: Adds a root node to the scene

name: addFloor
description: Adds a floor to the scene

name: addBuilding
description: Adds a building to the scene root. A building is an Object3D with 1 or 2 children cubes. The amount depends on the delta value of the cube.

params.name: showLabel
params.description: true if the building should get a label

name: addLabel
description: adds a label at the given position

name: makeText
description: Returns a text sprite

name: addLightsToScene
description: Add scene lighting

name: drawScene
description: draws the current scene

name: clearScene
description: clears the current scene. Lights remain in the scene

name: getTransformedMesh
description: Efficiently creates a new mesh.

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/codeMapService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/codeMap/threeViewer/threeCameraService.js
ThreeCameraService
description: Manages the three js camera in an angular way.

name: init
description: Inits the camera with a specific container width and height

app/codeCharta/codeMap/threeViewer/threeOrbitControlsService.js
ThreeOrbitControlsService
description: Service to manage the three orbit controls in an angular way.

name: ThreeOrbitControls
description: No official docs exist. {@link https://github.com/mattdesl/three-orbit-controls}

name: init
description: Inits the controls on the given DOM Element

params.name: domElement
params.description: Element with the canvas on it

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/threeViewer/threeOrbitControlsService.spec.js

ThreeRendererService
description: A service which manages the Three.js renderer in an angular way.

name: init
description: Inits the renderer.

ThreeSceneService
description: A service which manages the Three.js scene in an angular way.

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/threeViewer/threeSceneService.spec.js

ThreeUpdateCycleService
description: This service allows other parts of the application to hook into the update cycle and get called on each cycle.

name: update
description: Updates all registered callback functions

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/threeViewer/threeUpdateCycleService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/codeMap/threeViewer/threeViewer.js
app/codeCharta/codeMap/threeViewer/threeViewerService.js
ThreeViewerService
description: A service to angularize the Three.js canvas.

name: init
description: Initializes the canvas and all necessary services.

params.name: element
params.description: DOM Element which should be the canvas

name: onWindowResize
description: Applies transformations on window resize.

name: animate
description: Calls the animation loop.

name: app/codeCharta/codeMap/threeViewer/threeViewerService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/core/core.js
app/codeCharta/core/data/data.js
app/codeCharta/core/data/dataService.js
DataService
description: This service loads, stores and sets the current revisions, map, metrics and deltas.

name: data
description: current data

name: $rootScope
description: Angular rootScope

name: validator
description: Reference to a dataValidatorService

name: setFileData
description:
Called when a new file is loaded. This method validates the data with {@link DataValidatorService#validate}, processes it and sets the member fields.
Selects the first revision in revisions as the currently selected map. Alerts the user if something goes wrong.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} promise with resolve and reject functions

return.description: promise with resolve and reject functions

name: setMetrics
description: Sets metrics from a revision by id.

name: setCurrentMapFromRevisions
description: Loads current map from revisions by id

emits.description: on $rootScope after setting the metrics and map.

name: calculateDeltas
description: Calculates delta values in revisions. Stores deltas in <leaf>.data.deltas.

unknown.tagValue: {CodeMap[]} revisions with delta data attached in leaves

return.description: revisions with delta data attached in leaves

name: calculateAttributeListDelta
description: Calculates deltas between two attribute lists

name: app/codeCharta/core/data/dataService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/core/data/dataValidatorService.js
DataValidatorService
description: This service validates the given data against the schema and other validation steps

name: http
description: stores the $http instance

name: uniqueArray
description: checks the array for unique names in its elements. The name must be stored in <element>.data.name

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if there are only unique names in the given array

return.description: true if there are only unique names in the given array

name: uniqueName
description: converts the data into a {d3#hierarchy} and checks if the children of the same parent have unique names in <child>.data.name

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if there are only unique names in a parents direct children

return.description: true if there are only unique names in a parents direct children

name: validate
description: validates the given file data against the schema file and checks for unique names in a parents direct children.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} with a resolve and reject function

return.description: with a resolve and reject function

name: app/codeCharta/core/data/dataValidatorService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/core/data/model/dataModel.js
revisions
description: currently loaded revisions

name: metrics
description: currently loaded metrics

name: currentmap
description: currently selected map/revision

name: app/codeCharta/core/scenario/model/scenario.js
Scenario
description: This class defines a codecharta scenario. It may store data like settings and gui configurations

name: name
description: name of this scenario

name: settings
description: settings for this scenario

name: app/codeCharta/core/scenario/scenario.js
app/codeCharta/core/scenario/scenarioService.js
ScenarioService
description: Applies and manages scenarios.

name: applyScenario
description: Applies a given scenario to the current codecharta session.

name: getScenarios
description: Returns an array of all scenarios.

name: getDefaultScenario
description: Returns the default scenario.

name: app/codeCharta/core/scenario/scenarioService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/core/settings/model/range.js
Range
description:
Defines a range with direction. The direction tells the user if the lower end has a positive meaning and the higher
end has a negative meaning (true) or vice versa (false). E.g. flipped is true therefore all values below from are
green, between from and to yellow and higher than to red.

params.name: flipped
params.description: direction (positive to negative (true) or the other way round (false))

name: from
description: starting value

name: to
description: ending value

name: flipped
description: direction (positive to negative (true) or the other way round (false))

name: app/codeCharta/core/settings/model/settings.js
Settings
description: This class defines the available set of settings in the CodeCharta application

name: map
description: currently selected map

name: neutralColorRange
description: currently set neutral color range. This defines the yellow color range and the whether higher or lower values are green or red.

name: areaMetric
description: currently selected area metric

name: heightMetric
description: currently selected heightm metric

name: colorMetric
description: currently selected color metric

name: deltas
description: delta flag

name: grid
description: grid flag

name: importSettingValues
description: Imports the given settings values without replacing this object with the given one.

name: app/codeCharta/core/settings/settings.js
app/codeCharta/core/settings/settingsService.js
SettingsService
description: Stores and manipulates the current settings

name: onDataChanged
description: if the parameters property metrics is longer than 2 elements then change the map and metric settings according to the parameter.

name: onSettingsChanged
description: Broadcasts a settings-changed event with the new {Settings} object as a payload

name: updateSettingsFromUrl
description: updates the settings object according to url parameters.

name: applySettings
description: Applies given settings

name: correctSettings
description: corrects settings, if the chosen metric is not available in the current map, the first three metrics are chosen as a default.

name: getMetricOrDefault
description: Checks if the given metricName is in the metricsArray. If it is in there, we return it, else we return the defaultValue.

params.name: metricName
params.description: a metric name to look for

params.name: defaultValue
params.description: a default name in case metricName was not found

name: app/codeCharta/core/settings/settingsService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/core/tooltip/tooltip.js
app/codeCharta/core/tooltip/tooltipService.js
TooltipService
description: Return tooltips containing descriptions

name: getTooltipTextByKey
description: returns the tooltip description related to the given key

unknown.tagValue: {String} the description related to the given key

return.description: the description related to the given key

name: replaceString
description: Function used for recursiveness with getTooltipTexByKey

name: app/codeCharta/core/tooltip/tooltipService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/core/treemap/TreeMapService.spec.js
app/codeCharta/core/treemap/treeMapService.js
TreeMapService
description: This service transforms valid file data to a custom treemap. Our custom treemap has a 3rd axis added to the nodes.

name: d3#treemap
description: creates an array of fully transformed/customized and visible {d3#treemap} nodes.

name: transformNode
description:
Transforms a d3 node to our specific representation. Our specification requires a third axis z.
-add z0 and z1 depending on treedepth and padding
-add w,l,h depending on data.type and x, y
-all we also write all important stuff into the node itself so we do not need node.data anymore (there could be obsolete data from old cc.jsons)
-the height of the new z axis needs to be scaled to the w/l of the {d3#treemap}

params.name: p
params.description: padding for minimal height, padding and folder height

name: getMaxNodeHeightInAllRevisions
description: Gets the height of the heighest building in all revisions in order to get a common scaling factor.

name: getArea
description: Extracts the area by areakey from the node.

params.name: areaKey
params.description: name of the area attribute key

name: app/codeCharta/core/treemap/treemap.js
app/codeCharta/core/url/url.js
app/codeCharta/core/url/urlService.js
UrlService
description: This service offers an application specific url API.

name: getParam
description: returns an url parameter value by its key.

name: getParameterByName
description: returns an url parameter value by its name/key.

name: getUrl
description: returns the current locations url

name: getFileDataFromQueryParam
description: returns the files content specified in the 'file' url parameter

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} which returns the files content on resolution

return.description: which returns the files content on resolution

name: getFileDataFromFile
description: returns the files content specified in the 'file' parameter

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} which returns the files content on resolution

return.description: which returns the files content on resolution

app/codeCharta/ui/common/checkbox/checkbox.js
app/codeCharta/ui/common/checkbox/checkboxDirective.js
CheckboxDirective
description: A simple checkbox customized for CodeCharta. Watches for model changes and calls the bound change-function

name: scope
description:
Binds 'model' with '='.
Binds 'label' string with @ (one time only).
Binds 'change' function with '&'.

name: link
description: Watches model changes and links the change function to it.

name: app/codeCharta/ui/common/checkbox/checkboxDirective.spec.js
app/codeCharta/ui/common/collapsible/collapsible.js
app/codeCharta/ui/common/collapsible/collapsibleDirective.js
CollapsibleDirective
description: Container for {CollapsibleElementDirective}. Inner elements do not replace this. They are put inside the ng-transclude tag.

name: app/codeCharta/ui/common/collapsible/collapsibleDirective.spec.js
app/codeCharta/ui/common/collapsibleElement/collapsibleElement.js
app/codeCharta/ui/common/collapsibleElement/collapsibleElementDirective.js
CollapsibleElementDirective
description: Collapsible element. Should be put inside a {@link CollapsibleDirective}.

name: scope
description:
Binds 'iconClass' string with @. It defines the collapsibles font awesome icon.
Binds 'label' string with @ (one time only).

name: link
description: calls the materialize function collapsible(...) on the collapsible element. This is needed to initialize the functionality.

app/codeCharta/ui/common/dropdown/dropdownDirective.js
DropdownDirective
description: Renders a dropdown menu.

name: scope
description: Binds 'label' string. Binds 'values' array with all possible values. Binds 'model' with the current selected value. Binds a 'change' function.

name: link
description: Links the change function to model changes.

app/codeCharta/ui/common/fab/fabDirective.js
FabDirective

Binds a font awesome icon as 'iconClass'.
